name: factsonindia
0:
”Alexa ask facts on india to tell me an indian fact”
”Alexa ask facts on india for a fact on india”
”Alexa tell facts on india to tell me an indian fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: facts on india
des:
Ask for Indian Facts, and learn about what really matters, and amazing facts about the country India. 

Indian Facts provide fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch indian facts" or "Alexa, open facts on india" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
